details: Project Guidance Session for TYBSc(IT) students was conducted by Alumni Students on Friday, 25th January 2019.
Grade Card distribution and Parents Teachers meeting was conducted for SYBSc(IT) students.

Session on 'Python & Data Science', 'Hadoop Big Data', and 'Scope of Data Science in placements' conducted by Dr. Sanjay Kadam, Mr. Kuldeep Singh, and Dr. Viday Kadam from DeveLearn Institute of Data Science.
Session on 'Career opportunities for BSc(IT) students after graduation in India as well as Abroad' by Ms. Vinni Rajesh Shah from Aarra Education Consultancy.
Session on 'ASP.NET MVC and Career Guidance' conducted by Mr. Kannan.S Maravar (Director, KEIGHTS INDIA PVT LTD).
Session on 'Prerequisites for MCA' conducted by Mr. Anup Palsokar, Associate Professor, SIES College of Management Studies.
Buddhi, the intellectual festival was held with 90 participants. The event was paperless and fully digital.
Buddhi festival relaunched as intra-collegiate initiative. Paperless event with 90 participants.
Established SIES College as an NPTEL local chapter. Students and Faculty enrolled in government-funded online courses.
TCS Placement Drive conducted at iON Digital Centre, Powai.
Infosys Placement Drive conducted at Viva College, Virar.
One-week training program for TYBSc(IT) students on Excel and Life Skills by HOPE Foundation (till 2nd January 2019).
Techfest EDIT v5.0 themed 'CRECIMIENTO' organized with 700 participants and 22 exciting events. 150 volunteers managed the event.
Baking Workshop - triple layer mousse by Chef Manasi Parekh with 5+ years experience.
Fiontra 2018 entrepreneurship event organized in the college quadrangle with 13 student-run stalls.
Field visit to FLAME University for 43 SYBMS students.
Event 'Diabetes Checkup' with 135 SYBMS & TYBMS students, part of LIMCA BOOKS OF RECORDS initiative.
Highest Diabetes Checkup by Lions Club attended by IT students - a LIMCA Book of Records event.
World Computer Literacy Day celebrated at SIES College by BSc(IT) students.
Green Certificate granted for e-waste collection of 197kg by FYBSc(IT) students and handed to Stree Mukti Sangathan.
SRLC - Power of One: Donation drive as a part of Foundation Course-I.
NGO hours completed by 105 FYBMS & 111 SYBMS students under Rashi Wadhwa and Divya Thakur.
Educational Visit to Sonal Group, Alibaug for TYBMS students (Logistics & Supply Chain Management).
Organized Visit to Sonal Group, Alibaug for practical insights into Logistics & Supply Chain Management.
78 SYBMS and 10 FYBMS students participated in Beach Cleaning Drive with Karma Yogi Charitable Trust.
Karma Yogi Charitable Trust Beach Cleaning Drive participated by FY/SY BMS students.
Training session for teachers of all SIES institutions by Mrs. Vijayalekshmy Kannan & Mr. Hiren Dhand (MCC College).
Digital Marketing session for TYBMS students by Intern Theory Ltd.
S.Y. and T.Y. Quiz with 10 teams, 3 rounds covering GK, banking knowledge, etc.
Kerala Flood Relief donation drive organized with The Bombay Keraleeyia Samaj collecting food, clothes, hygiene products etc.
Session on Data Interpretation for TYBSc(IT) students conducted by Mr. Vinayak Krishnan.
Visit to National Institute of Securities Markets (NISM), Patalganga for 44 SYBMS finance students.
Online test to gauge learning styles of FYBMS students by Pradnya Waghule.
Orientation for FYBMS students and parents by SYBMS & TYBMS.
Seminar for B.Sc.IT students by Mr. Sanjay Kadam from DEVELEARN Institute.
Induction and Ice Breaking Activities for FYBMS Students conducted by SYBMS.
Project Guidance Session for TYBSc(IT) students by Alumni (multiple batch sessions on this date).
Aptitude Test for B.Sc.IT students by Mr. Amit Pandey from IMS Learning Resources.
TYBSc(IT) students attended Data Science BootCamp at ISME, Lower Parel.
Group Discussion and Personal Interview session by Mr. Aakash S. from IMS Learning Resources Ltd.
CV Writing Workshop for TYBMS students by Ms. Pradnya Waghule.
Soft Skill Development Program conducted by Ms. Pradnya Waghule for TYBSc(IT).
